casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Bruce A. KENT. No. D-2910. Supreme Court of the United States July 18, 2016.

Bruce A. Kent, of Arbutus, Maryland, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
